text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in https://github.com/oscarmakala/div-lab-ig/CodeSystem/laboratory-service-definition-type
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    testunitary measurement performed on an in vitro biologic specimenlaboratory service performing a single measurement
    panelcollection of tests and panels performed on one or more in vitro biologic specimenslaboratory service comprising two or more tests and/or panels

name: LaboratoryServiceType
title: Types of diagnostic services performed by a laboratory
publisher: HL7 International - Orders and Observations Work Group
description: This value set is restricted to these two codes: test | panel

concept.display: unitary measurement performed on an in vitro biologic specimen
collection of tests and panels performed on one or more in vitro biologic specimens
